divs: Sighting DetailsWe were watching a movie on television when we saw a cylindrical object outsidethe window. It was moving back and forth in the sky, which is why we noticed it.We first thought it was a plane. We went outside to see what it was and it camedown about 25 feet from the house in the pasture. We underwent hypnosis anddiscovered that an alien named Zim and his robot Gir abducted us, ate ourbrains, and forced us to eat poop brand candy bars.
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Chambersburg
There were no other sightings in Chambersburg on or around April 4th 2002
